about_the_game:
GRAB YOUR ANCHOR AND LET'S PLAY!

Fio Fizhook is a colorful first person game about a made-up sport. Look out for Fish shooting off cannons, hook them with an anchor and punch them through the ramps, making use of the curves and adapting to the map objectives.

THE FIZHOOK CLUB

Is a popular club where this sport is practiced. Here there are all types of places to be enjoyed by Fizhook lovers, each map have a unique way of gaining points. Hit fish in a basket or break targets in a row, among others.

BIRDS, FISH AND SPORT

Fio is a somewhat lazy pelican. One day she gets invited by her friend Fiz to his club; the Fizhook Club. He has apparently made a club about that made-up sport they spent afternoons playing as kids. Now Fio will try to get better in the same sport on a more profesional environment.
detailed_description:
GRAB YOUR ANCHOR AND LET'S PLAY!

Fio Fizhook is a colorful first person game about a made-up sport. Look out for Fish shooting off cannons, hook them with an anchor and punch them through the ramps, making use of the curves and adapting to the map objectives.

THE FIZHOOK CLUB

Is a popular club where this sport is practiced. Here there are all types of places to be enjoyed by Fizhook lovers, each map have a unique way of gaining points. Hit fish in a basket or break targets in a row, among others.

BIRDS, FISH AND SPORT

Fio is a somewhat lazy pelican. One day she gets invited by her friend Fiz to his club; the Fizhook Club. He has apparently made a club about that made-up sport they spent afternoons playing as kids. Now Fio will try to get better in the same sport on a more profesional environment.
name: Fio Fizhook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.80+ Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.80+ Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A colorful first person game about a made-up sport. Throw an anchor, hook peculiar fish and punch them through ramps and turns!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
